fn.p: MDD = major depressive disorder; Edu = years of education; HAM-D21 = Hamilton Depression Rating Scale (21-item); FD = framewise displacement; RRS = Ruminative Response Scale ; F = female; M = male.
Means with standard deviations in parentheses are presented, except for sex ratio.
